else ' ' end as goods_gubun_nm, cc.cnt from ( select bb.user_id,bb.name,bb.goods_gubun,count(bb.goods_gubun) cnt from ( select aa.user_id,aa.name,aa.account_no,aa.seq_no,aa.goods_gubun, aa.goods_code, FROM dual),'yyyy-mm-dd') else ' ' end as mangi_date, case when d.goods_gubun = 1 then (select interest_rate from interestrate_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and period_mm = d.period_mm and status = 1) when d.goods_gubun = 2 then (select trbase_price from baseprice_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and status = 1) when d.goods_gubun = 3 then (select exchange_rate from exchangerate_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and seq_no = (select max(seq_no) from exchangerate_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = to_char(sysdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') and status = 1)) when d.goods_gubun = 4 then (select stock_price from stockprice_his where goods_code = c.goods_code and base_date = from customer_mas a,account_mas b,basketlist_his c,goods_mas d where b.ref_status = 1 and a.user_id = b.user_id and a.user_id = c.user_id and c.status = 1 and c.goods_code = d.goods_code ) aa ) bb group by bb.user_id,bb.name,bb.goods_gubun ) cc where cc.user_id = #{user_id} order by goods_gubun
